column1: Happy #VeteransDay to all those who serve our country. Never forget the sacrifices of those who gave it all so we can sleep peacefully.   I was humbled to spend the morning at Arlington Cemetery paying my respects with @POTUS @FLOTUS @VP & @SecondLady https://t.co/WBDp8mIng5

Tonight the Senate will vote to #ConfirmACB and #FilltheSeat. Judge #ACB is an exceptional and impressive jurist that will uphold the Constitution and interpret our laws the way they are written. https://t.co/ozcyQSTgud
Fong and I are praying for @POTUS and @FLOTUS and wishing them a speedy recovery.

Yesterday I signed onto @HouseGOP's discharge petition led by @HerreraBeutler that forces a vote to free up #PaycheckProtectionProgram loans being held hostage by Pelosi. The PPP helped small businesses and Congress needs to get the remaining $138 billion out the door.   #KS02 https://t.co/76gGmW3D7b
